did.unittitle: United Steelworkers of America - Organizing Kit [flyers, handbook, pencil, stickers, button, newsletter]
Business card wallet; bumper stickers; union label stickers; Steel Worker Women stickers
Buttons - USWA button; United Steelworkers of America Local Union Safety & Health Representative; Local 1005 button; Guest badge-United Steelworkers of America, Aug. 31-Sept. 4, 1992
